data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Sphedanolestes Stål 1866 (Hemiptera: Reduviidae: Harpactorinae) from China, with a key to Chinese species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhao, Ping, Ren, Shuzhi, Wang, Baohai, Cai, Wanzhi (2015): A new species of the genus Sphedanolestes Stål 1866 (Hemiptera: Reduviidae: Harpactorinae) from China, with a key to Chinese species. Zootaxa 3985 (4): 591-599, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3985.4.8
